test_scenarios.name: New Patient Registration and Login
steps: Navigate to the Teladoc website (https://www.teladoc.com).
Click on the 'Sign Up' or 'Get Started' button.
Fill out the required registration form with valid personal information (Name, DOB, Address, etc.).
Create a secure username and password.
Accept the terms and conditions.
Verify email address using link sent to email.
Log in with the newly created username and password.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully registered and logged into the Teladoc platform.

test_scenarios.name: Request a General Medical Consultation
steps: Log in to the Teladoc platform.
Navigate to the 'Request a Consultation' or similar section.
Select 'General Medical' consultation type.
Describe the medical issue/reason for the consultation in the text box.
Select preferred method of consultation (e.g., phone, video).
Choose a time for the consultation.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A consultation request is successfully submitted, and confirmation is displayed to the user.

test_scenarios.name: Pharmacy Integration (e-Prescription)
steps: Complete a consultation with a Teladoc physician who prescribes medication.
Verify that the physician sends an e-prescription to the user's preferred pharmacy (previously specified in user profile or during the consultation process).
Check patient profile to ensure pharmacy information is correct
test_scenarios.expected_result: The e-prescription is successfully sent to the selected pharmacy, and the user receives a notification about the prescription.

test_scenarios.name: Initiate and Complete a Video Consultation
steps: Log in to the Teladoc platform.
Navigate to the 'Upcoming Consultations' or 'Scheduled Consultations' section.
Click on the 'Join Video Call' button at the scheduled consultation time.
Grant necessary permissions (microphone, camera).
Conduct the video consultation with the physician.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A stable video connection is established, the user and physician can communicate effectively, and the consultation is completed successfully.

test_scenarios.name: Process Payment
steps: After the video consultation a payment screen appears.
Enter valid payment details (credit card).
Confirm payment amount and submit.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The payment should process successfully, and the user should see a confirmation message.
